abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32934372, pmid32841948, pmid32756614, pmid32907668, pmid32862832, pmid32905581, pmid32840561
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.09.17
